contributions.title: Michael J. Assante Awarded SANS ICS Lifetime Achievement Award - March 2018
contributions.description: Michael's work in ICS security has helped bring attention to an area that was largely unaddressed, despite its potential to affect critical infrastructure, human life and safety.

contributions.title: ICS Cyber Kill Chain
contributions.description: Michael Assante co-authored the ICS Cyber Kill Chain with Robert Lee, Oct 2015

contributions.title: Smart Grid Cybersecurity: Job Performance Model Report
contributions.description: Michael Assante co-authored with report in August 2012

contributions.title: No Grid Left Behind
contributions.description: Michael Assante co-authored this document which was published in IEEE Security & Privacy Vol 8, Iss 1, Jan-Feb 2010
